description:
Explore the road less traveled, or even the road less paved. If you are looking for a gravel grinder that is equally at home during your weekly commutes as it is on the trails, the Topstone 4 could be your next bike. From techie trails to bike lanes that have seen better days, this smooth rolling bike doesn’t mind the rough stuff. Plush 37C tires and a carbon fork help minimize vibrations before they get to you. And if you are serious about gravel riding, you’ll be happy to know that this stable bike is dropper post ready.

  • SmartForm C2 alloy frame and BallisTec Full Carbon fork, with efficient gravel bike geometry
  • Frame is compatible with an internally-routed 27.2 dropper post (sold separately)
  • Removable fender bridge provides mounting options
  • 1x10 drive train pairs a 40T chain ring with an 11-48T cassette
  • MicroSHIFT Advent X components with an alloy Prowheel crank
  • ProMax Render R mechanical disc brakes keep velocity under control
  • WTB Riddler Comp tires in a plush 37C offer great grip
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Topstone 4 Bicycle - Unisex
